Name: Bling Ruff
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Meowth and Persian.  You can get a Bling Ruff at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Meowth Claw, a Meowth Fang, and a Coin Charm. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
